    • Uses of Node in gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core

      Methods in gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ArgumentIdentificationWithCoreference.argumentIdentification(Node node, DocumentGraph docGraph, java.util.List<ArgumentRule> rules, SemanticGraph semGraph, java.util.LinkedHashSet<SemanticItem> allChildSemantics, boolean createGeneric, boolean createIfExists)
      Same as ArgumentIdentification.argumentIdentification(Node, DocumentGraph, List, SemanticGraph, LinkedHashSet, boolean, boolean) but incorporates coreference resolution into the processing.

    • Uses of Node in gov.nih.nlm.ling.composition

      Methods in gov.nih.nlm.ling.composition with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ArgumentIdentification.argumentIdentification(Node node, DocumentGraph docGraph, java.util.List<ArgumentRule> rules, SemanticGraph semGraph, java.util.LinkedHashSet<SemanticItem> allChildSemantics, boolean createGeneric, boolean createIfExists)
      Recursively identifies arguments for a given Node in a DocumentGraph using ArgumentRules, progressively building a SemanticGraph object.
      static void ArgumentPropagation.propagate(Node node, java.util.Map<Edge,java.util.LinkedHashSet<SemanticItem>> argStructure, java.util.LinkedHashSet<SemanticItem> composedItems, java.util.LinkedHashSet<SemanticItem> children)
      Propagates arguments up the embedding graph, if necessary.

    • Uses of Node in gov.nih.nlm.ling.core

      Subinterfaces of Node in gov.nih.nlm.ling.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ContiguousSurfaceElement
      An interface for contiguous textual units, which extends SurfaceElement interface.
      interface  SurfaceElement
      An interface to represent textual units.
      Classes in gov.nih.nlm.ling.core that implement Node 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSurfaceElement
      The basic implementation of SurfaceElement interface.
      class  GappedMultiWord
      Represents a textual unit with non-contiguous parts.
      class  MultiWord
      Represents a contiguous textual unit with more than one token.
      class  Word
      Representation of a single token with sentence index, part-of-speech, lemma, and span information.

    • Uses of Node in gov.nih.nlm.ling.graph

      Classes in gov.nih.nlm.ling.graph that implement Node 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DummyNode
      Represents a dummy node, which can be used to represent units that go beyond textual units, such as documents, sentences, quotations, etc.
